holidays.description: Ready to dive into all things unpredictable on Pandemonium Day?

holidays.title: Barn Day
holidays.description: The traditional red barn has long been an iconic symbol of American farming communities.

holidays.title: Bastille Day
holidays.description: Sacré bleu! We celebrate the toppling of the long-standing French monarchy!

holidays.title: Bastille day (Saint Martin)
holidays.description: Celebrate the power of revolution with the French as we mark Bastille Day with pride!

holidays.title: Emmeline Pankhurst Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn what the conditions for women would be without Emmeline Pankhurst.

holidays.title: Fete de la Federation
holidays.description: Join us as we look back at the Fete de la Federation this July 14!

holidays.title: International Non-Binary Peoples Day
holidays.description: Today we are shining a light on all non-binary individuals and talking about their diversity.

holidays.title: Kharchi Puja
holidays.description: Participate in this festival of worshiping the 14 gods and the earth.

holidays.title: National Be Nice to Bugs Day
holidays.description: Let’s take a pledge not to kill insects. Heard of the motto “Live and let live?”

holidays.title: National Grand Marnier Day
holidays.description: Like your cocktails fancy and adventurous? We bring you the latest in world-class booze.

holidays.title: National Nude Day
holidays.description: Nudist groups around the world celebrate National Nude Day by going "au naturel."

holidays.title: National Tape Measure Day
holidays.description: Everyone has one because they’re universally useful!

holidays.title: Shark Awareness Day
holidays.description: There’s a bigger chance of being struck by lightning than being killed or attacked by a shark.

holidays.title: Dorit Kemsley’s Birthday
holidays.description: Not only is she a reality T.V. star, she’s also an entrepreneur — and today’s her birthday!

holidays.title: Gerald Ford’s Birthday
holidays.description: From a young professional football player to the president of the United States!

holidays.title: Koe Wetzel’s Birthday
holidays.description: His blend of country and grunge music has been dubbed the ‘Hillbilly Punk-Rock.’

holidays.title: Tameka Harris’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dynamite truly does come in Tiny packages for this star! Celebrate her today!

holidays.title: Trap Beckham’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this American trap artist who keeps growing, nothing is getting in his way!

holidays.title: Vinnie Hacker’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media influencer has the world in the palm of his hands.
